name: Pepper and Carrot: Potions
description:
A prototype game set in the world of Pepper and Carrot. Guide a young witch in gathering ingredients and brewing potions.

Pepper and Carrot is created by David Revoy, who generously licenses the world and artwork under the CC-BY 4.0 license. The webcomic and all image sources can be found at www.peppercarrot.com.
